top_sentences.sentence_text: in addition to the facts that a the modems i had ordered two wouldn't work as documented and b the tech person had no clue as to how it should work it also turned out that c one of the two modems they sent was clearly used but the techs
that they are incompetent is one thing but that they sell used stuff as new and won't even apologize for it is another
